summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 4291 for the improvement of Dayton Avenue, from North 36th Street to North 42nd Street; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues, by paving and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 50954, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
